queries.text: How do I reset my password?
queries.response: To reset your password, go to the login page, click on 'Forgot Password?' and follow the instructions sent to your registered email.

queries.text: What should I do if I can’t log in?
queries.response: Check if you are entering the correct username and password. If you’ve forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password?' option. If the issue persists, contact support.

queries.text: What should I do if I encounter an error message?
queries.response: Take a note of the error message and try refreshing the page. If the issue continues, please report it to customer support with details.

queries.text: How do I contact customer support?
queries.response: Just drop one email - 'support-idp@infrrd.ai' and our support representative will reach out to you

queries.text: Is my data secure on this platform?
queries.response: Yes, we use encryption and comply with data protection regulations to ensure your data is secure. Please refer to our privacy policy for more details.

queries.text: Can I access the application from my mobile device?
queries.response: Our IDP Platform is more suitable with the Desktop browser. However, it can be accessed from any mobile device through your web browser

queries.text: How do I log out of my account?
queries.response: To log out, click on the top right corner and select the 'Log Out' option.

queries.text: How can I provide feedback about the application?
queries.response: We welcome your feedback! You can submit your suggestions through the email - rahulapte@infrrd.ai or +91-087654315
